info.name: Dark Image (JPG, PNG, GIF) Background
info.description: Centers the image and changes background to a nice pleasing dark color or a custom chosen color.
info.additionalInfo: 2016-11-24 Fix for regexes so it doesn't accidentally trigger on some sites, for instance, github.io. "https?://.*\\.[jJ][pP][eE]?[gG]\??.*" changed to "https?://.*\\.[jJ][pP][eE]?[gG]\\??[^/]*"

options.label: Center
